name: layerJS
description: layerJS, a lean javascript UX framework
author: LayerJs

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.build:scripts: mkdirp build && browserify -e src/layerjs.js -o build/layerjs.js && npm run package
scripts.build:compressed: mkdirp build && browserify -e src/layerjs.js | uglifyjs -c -m -o build/layerjs.js && npm run package
scripts.package: mkdirp ./dist/css && node ./scripts/copy.js ./build/layerjs.js ./dist/layerjs.js && node ./scripts/copy.js ./dist/layerjs.js ./dist/layerjs-$npm_package_version.js && node ./scripts/copy.js ./src/css/layerjs.css ./dist/css/layerjs.css && cd dist && zip layerjs-$npm_package_version.zip layerjs-$npm_package_version.js css/*
scripts.fixlibs: for i in `find ./examples | grep layerjs.js` ; do rm $i;cp ./dist/layerjs.js $i;done;for i in `find ./examples | grep layerjs.css` ; do rm $i; cp ./dist/css/layerjs.css $i;done;
